medicalRecords.content:
*L-Spine MRI & CTL 2025/03/12
제목(Title):
Findings:
Clinical information; 허리 통증
좌측 엉치-허벅지(외)-종아리(외)-발바닥 저림, 감각저하
우측 발꿈치 저림
양측 무릎 통증(Rt

Operation Date: 2025-03-24
Anesthesia:
General
Findings:
A; retrolisthesis L4/5
spinal stenosis L4/5
both foraminal stenosis L4/5, L5/S1
spinal stenosis L5/S1
Procedures:
1. Under general anesthesia, prone position
2. Midline vertical incision about 6 cm. Exposure of L4-S1laminar after bilateral PVM splitting.
3. Bilateral hemilaminectomy of L4 & L5 with facetectomy were done and bilatral L5 & S1 roots were identified and
decompressed. Severe stenosis of L4-5 & L5/S1 level was noted. Satisfactory decompression was achieved bilaterally.
4. After identification of L4, L5 and S1 pedicles, pedicle screw were inserted in each pedicle.
5. L4-5 & L5/S1 discectomy was done with currate and pit rongeur. Two intervertebral cages were inserted in each side of
L4-5 & L5/S1 intervertebral space.
6. Hemostant and antiadhesive agent, Inogram and Gelform was apply.
6. After checking of intraop X-ray, the wound was closed layer by layer remaing the drain.
검체: NO
Sponge Count Correct: YES
Dictated/Writen by: 71
1
Micro2Nucleotome Kit: NO
Surgeon's signature:
백운기 성 명송금숙
과

주민/ F )

양측 무릎 통증(RtRt.)
onset) several years ago
trauma Hx. (-)
무릎 아픈지 오래됐다.
타병원에서 진료 보고 주사도 많이 맞았다 몇일 뒤에는 신경차단술?을 받으러 오라고 했다.
연골이 닳았다고 들었다.
*기저질환: HBP, Hyperlipipdemia
P/E) both knee-swelling/effusion (+/+) (+/+)Td(-)
X-ray) KL OA type |||/|||
A)
Plan)
1. X-ray
2. OP. recommend; TKRA, both
